The shortfilm "Pixels"

  • Apr 08 2010
  • Tagged inspiration

This is so coooool!! A shortfilm about an New York invasion by pixel creatures shooting from a tv. PIXELS is apparently directed by a guy named Patrick Jean – hope to see a lot more from him!

Due to copyright claims this video is no longer available. Hmm...!
